test_Description:
1.Open browser and navigate to URL :
"https://lcaas.techmahindra.com/plsql
2. Enter the value 'demouser' in the field.
3. Enter the value 'demouser1' in the field.
4. Click on 'Login'.
5. Click on 'Business Rule Extraction'.
6. Click on 'Detailed Report'.
7. Click on 'All'.
8. Click on 'PACKAGE'.
9. Click on 'EPIC_ORDERS_SPEC_CHECKS_PKG'.
10. Click on 'Submit'.
11. Click on 'Employee Record'.
12. Click on 'STAND ALONE'.
13. Click on 'FUNCTION'.
14. Click on 'Submit'.
15. Click on 'Log Out'.
